title: MLB Network Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user navigates to the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user taps on the MLB Network segment
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLB Network tab will display

AND

+ Watch Live Now video player will be featured

AND

+ The "Coming Up" schedule will be available

title: Current Show Description
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the MLB Network page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the Watch Live Now program header and description
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The title of the show is displayed

AND

+ The description of the show is displayed underneath the title

AND

+ The time of airing is displayed underneath the description

title: Program List
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the MLB Network segment under Watch tab
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Start times and Program titles will be displayed in a menu the user can scroll through

title: Authorization - User Logs in - EDIT
custom_preconds: Given the user is not logged in with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user has been taken to the login screen
after tapping the MLB Network Play button
and logs in with a valid account
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken the MLB Network MVPD auth flow in a webview

title: Authorization - User Creates Account - EDIT
custom_preconds: Given the user is not logged in with an MLB account
custom_steps:
When the user has been taken to the login screen
after tapping the MLB Network Play button
and creates a new account
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken the MLB Network MVPD auth flow in a webview

title: Unsuccessful Authorization - EDIT
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MLB Network auth flow webview
custom_steps: When the user inputs invalid cable credentials
custom_expected:
Then the user will be presented with an error message
and video playback will not commence

title: Rotate to Landscape During Playback
custom_preconds: Given the user is entitled for MLB Network
custom_steps:
When the user is playing back the MLB Network stream in Portrait
and the user rotates the device to Landscape
custom_expected:
Then the video will transition into a master-detail style layout similar to what occurs in the PlayList
and the video will continue to play embedded

title: Rotate Back to Portrait During Playback
custom_preconds: Given the user is entitled for MLB Network
custom_steps:
When the user is playing back the MLB Network stream
and the device is in Landscape
custom_expected:
Then the video will be re-embedded in the playback area view at the top of the page
and the behavior of the embedded video will be similar to the embedded video playback that occurs in the PlayList

title: Full Screen
custom_preconds: Given the user is entitled for MLB Network
custom_steps:
When the user is playing back the MLB Network stream
and taps to bring up the player controls
and taps the Full Screen button
custom_expected:
Then the video will transition to full screen
and playback will be uninterrupted

title: Rotating to Landscape - EDIT
custom_preconds:
Given the user is viewing the MLB Network page in the MLB app
and the device is in Portrait
custom_steps:
When the user rotates the device to Landscape
(when video is not playing)
custom_expected: Then the view will transition into a master-detail style layout similar to what occurs in the PlayList

title: MLB Network - Logged-in, MVPD Auth
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A logged-in, MVPD authorized user navigates to the MLB Network segment in the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Tapping the play button on the "Watch Live Now" MLBN video
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLB Network stream will begin playback

title: MLB Network - Free, MVPD Auth
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A logged-in, MVPD authorized user navigates to the MLB Network segment in the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Tapping the play button on the "Watch Live Now" MLBN video
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLB Network stream will begin playback

title: MLB Network - Logged-out, No entitlement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A logged-out user, without MVPD authorization or MLBN entitlement user navigates to the MLB Network segment in the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Tapping the play button on the "Watch Live Now" MLBN video
custom_expected:
THEN

+ the user should be directed to the login screen

title: MLB Network - Exec Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has signed into an executive account

AND

+ The executive account is entitled for all contentTypes
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the MLBN live stream in the Home page 

AND

+ Selecting the MLBN live stream from the Hero or Today's carousel
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The Exec user will receive successful playback

AND

+ The MLBN live stream will play back from the live point

title: MLB Network - Logged-in, MVPD Auth
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A logged-in, MLBN entitled user

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the MLB Network segment in the Watch tab

AND 

+ Tapping the play button on the "Watch Live Now" MLBN video
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN

+ The MLB Network stream will begin playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the MLBN content on the Watch Now Tab

AND 

+ The user taps on the MLBN content
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN

+ The MLB Network stream will begin playback

title: MLB Network - Logged-in, No entitlement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A logged-in user, without MVPD authorization or MLBN entitlement user navigates to the MLB Network segment in the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Tapping the play button on the "Watch Live Now" MLBN video
custom_expected:
THEN

+ the user should be directed to the paywall
